lead_paragraph: A former president of the Maldives, Mohamed Nasheed, was convicted and sentenced to 13 years in prison on Friday after a quick and disputed trial over accusations that he ordered a senior judge arrested while in office.

headline.main: Maldives: Ex-President Is Sentenced to 13 Years in Prison
headline.print_headline: Maldives: Ex-President Is Sentenced to 13 Years in Prison

snippet: A former president of the Maldives, Mohamed Nasheed, was convicted and sentenced to 13 years in prison on Friday after a quick and disputed trial over accusations that he ordered a senior judge arrested while in office.
